text: وَلَقَدۡ هَمَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ وَهَمَّ بِهَا لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّءَا بُرۡهَٰنَ رَبِّهِۦۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءَۚ إِنَّهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
translation: Dhugumatti, isheen isatti yaadde, innis isheetti yaade, Odoo ragaa Gooftaa isaa arguu baatee. Akka kanatti hamtuufi hojii fokkataa isa irraa deebisuuf (ragaa keenya isa agarsiifne). Dhugumatti, inni gabroota keenya qulqulleeffamoo irraayyi.
